messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: James Sandbach has a track record of delivery, with a history of reducing the deficit, providing tax cuts, increasing the health budget, and investing in education. His commitment is to continue progress, balance books, cut income taxes, guarantee mental health services, and protect education spending.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Finish the job of balancing the books, time and fairly; Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Guarantee mental health services and increase NHS spending by £8bn a year.
Protect education spending from cradle to college.

issues.economy: Finish the job of balancing the books, time and fairly; Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
issues.education: Protect education spending from cradle to college.
issues.health: Guarantee mental health services and increase NHS spending by £8bn a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: 3 great reasons to vote for James Sandbach: James is local, and lives in Saxmundham. James is a longstanding campaigner for social justice, and has worked for several national charities. James has the skills to be an effective MP and a strong voice for Suffolk Coastal in Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain; Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers; Increased the health budget and helped to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors; Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school kids.

Finish the job of balancing the books, time and fairly; Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers; Guarantee mental health services and increase NHS spending by £8bn a year; Protect education spending from cradle to college.

contactInformation.address: Suffolk Coastal Lib Dems, 38 High Street, Saxmundham, IP17 1AB.

images.caption: James Sandbach standing near a coastal structure.
